body_html:
@suiyuan2009 do you want to implement this ZeroInitialize op? I expect it
will be quite similar to what you have here in the end.

On Wed, Sep 7, 2016 at 9:42 AM, Derek Murray notifications@github.com
wrote:

@alextp https://github.com/alextp I think your suggestion of a
ZeroInitializer op makes more sense than adding a flag to the individual
assign ops. I'd be inclined to keep it in tf.contrib because it seems
specific to the current implementation of variables, it's not fundamental,
and we will probably want to deprecate it once there's no longer a need for
it.

Longer term, it would be great if we could identify points in the graph
where a tensor buffer is expiring, so we could replace the copy in
tf.assign() with a move, but in the short term this should work.

—
